name: Vegetable is Alive
description:
---

---

---

You must grow a Vegetable

---

Extend your roots to get resources

unfurl your leaves for sunlight

  grow a Vegetable

---

Controls

When in Seed form, A/D or Arrow keys to roll left or right.

Once you have taken root, zoom the camera in or out using the mousewheel, and move the camera up and down by approaching the edge of the screen.

Left Mouse for everything else!

This game was made in a week for Brackeys Jam 2023.1!

The theme of the Jam:  An End is a New Beginning

Hope you enjoy!
